short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Despiral is an application that changes your addictive social media behaviour for the better

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social Media distracts us easily from what's important.

Creativity and productivity often come short to scrolling through memes and pictures of your aunt's best friend's meal.

Despiral changes that. We take the approach of "the quantity makes the poison". Getting entertained on Social Media isn't inherently bad. Too much of it is.

Despiral interrupts your habit of endless scrolling and puts your focus back on what really matters to you. If that is creating art, playing video games or studying.

You gain full control over how long you want to scroll and how long you want to be productive.
